If your company is currently offering services such as process automation, 3D viewers, consulting, data processing, software development, interoperability solutions, and data visualization, you may want to consider adding services that are closely related to these. Some potential options could include:

1. Building information modeling (BIM): BIM is a digital representation of the physical and functional characteristics of a building or infrastructure project. Adding BIM services could allow your company to help clients design and plan their projects more effectively.
2. Virtual reality (VR) and augmented reality (AR): VR and AR technologies can be used to create immersive, interactive experiences that allow clients to visualize and explore their projects in a more engaging way. Adding VR and AR services could help your company stand out and provide value to clients.
3. Project management: Project management services can help clients plan, coordinate, and execute their projects more efficiently. This could involve providing project management software, training, and consulting services.
4. Facility management: Facility management services can help clients maintain and operate their buildings and other assets more effectively. This could involve providing software, training, and consulting services to help clients manage their facilities more efficiently.
5. Sustainability consulting: Sustainability consulting services can help clients design and build projects that are more environmentally friendly and sustainable. This could involve providing guidance on materials, energy use, water conservation, and other sustainability-related issues.
